Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.items.ScaleItem

  • Packages that use ScaleItem 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks
    All callbacks interfaces to be implemented, also to use the scriptable options of CHART.JS.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration
    Contains all elements to configure a chart instance (know as chart options at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.events
    Contains all events to interact with chart instance.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins
    Contains some plugins implementations, available out-of-the box.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.items
    Contains all elements generated by CHART.JS, which are mapping java script objects, to use at runtime in plugins, events or controllers.

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration that return ScaleItem 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ScaleItem Axis.getScaleItem()
      Returns the scale item related to this axis.
      private ScaleItem EventAxesHandler.searchScaleItem​(NativeBaseEvent event)
      Searches the ScaleItem instance related to the event.
      If the NativeBaseEvent instance is not related to any ScaleItem, returns null.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration with parameters of type ScaleItem 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void EventAxesHandler.managedHoveredAxis​(NativeAbstractMouseEvent mouseEvent, ScaleItem scaleItem, Axis axis)
      Manages hover event on axis where hovered axis is already found.
      private void EventAxesHandler.manageHoverEventOnAxis​(NativeBaseEvent event, ScaleItem scaleItem, Axis axis)
      Manages hover event on axis.
      private Axis EventAxesHandler.searchAxis​(ScaleItem scaleItem)
      Searches the Axis instance related to the scale item.
      If the ScaleItem instance is not related to any configured Axis, returns null.

    • Uses of ScaleItem in org.pepstock.charba.client.items

      Subclasses of ScaleItem in org.pepstock.charba.client.items 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AxisItem
      There are a number of configuration callbacks that can be used to change parameters in the scale at different points in the update process.
      This is a wrapper of the CHART.JS item with all needed info about an axis.
      Implements all set methods to change java script object properties.
      Fields in org.pepstock.charba.client.items declared as ScaleItem 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private ScaleItem PluginScaleArgument.scaleItem  
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.items that return ScaleItem 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ScaleItem DatasetItem.getIndexScale()
      Returns the index scale item or null if not exists.
      If IndexAxis = IndexAxis.Y then iScale === yScale and vScale === xScale.
      For radar, iScale === vScale === rScale.
      ScaleItem DatasetItem.getRScale()
      Returns the R scale item or null if not exists.
      ScaleItem ScalesNode.getScaleIsInside​(NativeAbstractMouseEvent event)
      Returns the scale item if the chart event is inside of one of scales, otherwise null.
      ScaleItem PluginScaleArgument.getScaleItem()
      Returns the scale item.
      ScaleItem DatasetItem.getValueScale()
      Returns the value scale item or null if not exists.
      If IndexAxis = IndexAxis.Y then iScale === yScale and vScale === xScale.
      For radar, iScale === vScale === rScale.
      ScaleItem DatasetItem.getXScale()
      Returns the X scale item or null if not exists.
      ScaleItem DatasetItem.getYScale()
      Returns the Y scale item or null if not exists.
      private ScaleItem DatasetItem.retrieveScale​(DatasetItem.Property key)
      Returns the scale item from a specific property.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.items that return types with arguments of type ScaleItem 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Map<String,​ScaleItem> ScalesNode.getItems()
      Returns a map with all defined axis.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.items with parameters of type ScaleItem 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) String JsItemsHelper.format​(ScaleItem scale, long time, String format)
      Formats the time passed as argument with the passed format.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getBasePixel​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns the pixel for the minimum chart value.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getBaseValue​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns the minimum chart value.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getDecimalForPixel​(ScaleItem scale, double pixel)
      Used to get the data value from a given pixel.
      This is the inverse of getPixelForValue.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getDistanceFromCenterForValue​(ScaleItem scale, double value)
      Returns the distance from the center of a specific value.
      (package private) String JsItemsHelper.getLabelForValue​(ScaleItem scale, double value)
      Used to get the label to display in the tooltip for the given value.
      (package private) ArrayObject JsItemsHelper.getLabelItems​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns the labels computed in the scale.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getPixelForDecimal​(ScaleItem scale, double decimal)
      Utility for getting the pixel location of a percentage of scale.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getPixelForStringValue​(ScaleItem scale, String value, double index)
      Returns the location of the given data point as string.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getPixelForTick​(ScaleItem scale, double index)
      Returns the location of the tick at the given index.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getPixelForValue​(ScaleItem scale, double value, double index)
      Returns the location of the given data point.
      Value can either be an index or a numerical value.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getValueForDistanceFromCenter​(ScaleItem scale, double distance)
      Returns the value calculated applying the specific distance from the center.
      (package private) double JsItemsHelper.getValueForPixel​(ScaleItem scale, double pixel)
      Used to get the data value from a given pixel.
      This is the inverse of getPixelForValue.
      The coordinate (0, 0) is at the upper-left corner of the canvas.
      (package private) boolean JsItemsHelper.isHorizontal​(ScaleItem scale)
      Returns true if the scale is horizontal.
